titles.title: Disapproving a rule submitted by the Environmental Protection Agency relating to "National Emission Standards for Hazardous Air Pollutants for Area Sources: Industrial, Commercial, and Institutional Boilers".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary: 5/11/2011--Introduced. Disapproves a rule submitted by the Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) relating to National Emission Standards for Hazardous Air Pollutants for Area Sources: Industrial, Commercial, and Institutional Boilers.
